  • RM for Remove, Replace Multiple File_Name

    07 Dec 2017 | Linux

    Menggunakan tool RM untuk Rename, Remove Character pada nama file 1. Command Line : Replace “_” with “-“ 1for file in *.jpg; do mv "${file}" "${file/_/-}"; done 2. Command Line : Replace “-“ with “-ID” 1for file in *.jpg; do mv "${file}" "${file/-/-ID}"; done 3....
